00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Reflection;
00024 using System.Collections;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 
00031 namespace NyFolder.PluginLib {
00033     public static class PluginManager {
00034         // ============================================
00035         // PUBLIC Events
00036         // ============================================
00038         public static event StringEventHandler LoadFailed = null;
00040         public static event StringEventHandler InitFailed = null;
00042         public static event BlankEventHandler Initing = null;
00044         public static event StringEventHandler StopFailed = null;
00046         public static event BlankEventHandler Stopping = null;
00047 
00048         // ============================================
00049         // PRIVATE Members
00050         // ============================================
00051         private static Hashtable pluginsTable = null;
00052         private static INyFolder nyFolder = null;
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC Methods
00056         // ============================================
00058         public static void Initialize (INyFolder nyFolderApp) {
00059             // Initialize Events (None)
00060             LoadFailed = null;
00061             InitFailed = null;
00062             Initing = null;
00063 
00064             // Set Interface to Access into NyFolder Application
00065             nyFolder = nyFolderApp;
00066 
00067             // Initialize Plugins Table
00068             if (pluginsTable != null) pluginsTable.Clear();
00069             pluginsTable = new Hashtable();
00070 
00071             // Load System's Plugins
00072             FindAssemblies(Paths.SystemPluginDirectory);
00073             // Load User's Plugins
00074             FindAssemblies(Paths.UserPluginDirectory);
00075         }
00076 
00078         public static void RunPlugins() {
00079             Plugin[] pluginList = SortPluginsByPriority();
00080             foreach (Plugin plugin in pluginList) {
00081                 try {
00082                     // Raise Initing Event
00083                     if (Initing != null) Initing(plugin);
00084 
00085                     // Initialize Plugin
00086                     plugin.Initialize(nyFolder);
00087                 } catch (Exception e) {
00088                     // Raise InitFailed Event
00089                     string msg = "Plugin's Initialization Error: " + e.Message;
00090                     if (InitFailed != null) InitFailed(plugin, msg);
00091 
00092                     // Remove Plugin From Table
00093                     pluginsTable.Remove(plugin.Info);
00094                 }
00095             }
00096         }
00097 
00099         public static void StopPlugins() {
00100             Plugin[] pluginList = ReverseSortPluginsByPriority();
00101             foreach (Plugin plugin in pluginList) {
00102                 try {
00103                     // Raise Stopping Event
00104                     if (Stopping != null) Stopping(plugin);
00105 
00106                     // Initialize Plugin
00107                     plugin.Uninitialize();
00108                 } catch (Exception e) {
00109                     // Raise InitFailed Event
00110                     string msg = "Plugin's Uninitialization Error: " + e.Message;
00111                     if (StopFailed != null) StopFailed(plugin, msg);                    
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 // Remove Plugin From Table
00115                 pluginsTable.Remove(plugin.Info);
00116             }
00117         }
00118 
00119         // ============================================
00120         // PRIVATE Methods
00121         // ============================================
00123         public static void FindAssemblies (string dirPath) {
00124             if (dirPath == null || dirPath == "") return;
00125 
00126             DirectoryInfo dirInfo = new DirectoryInfo(dirPath);
00127             if (dirInfo.Exists == false) return;
00128 
00129             foreach (FileInfo file in dirInfo.GetFiles()) {
00130                 if (file.Extension != ".dll") continue;
00131 
00132                 // Load Assembly and Scan It
00133                 Assembly asm = Assembly.LoadFrom(file.FullName);
00134                 ScanAssemblyForPlugin(asm);
00135             }
00136         }
00137 
00139         private static void ScanAssemblyForPlugin (Assembly asm) {
00140             foreach (Type t in asm.GetTypes()) {
00141                 if (t.IsSubclassOf(typeof(Plugin)) == true) {
00142                     // Type t of Assmbly file seems a plugin, Load it.
00143                     LoadPlugin(t);
00144                 }
00145             }
00146         }
00147 
00150         private static void LoadPlugin (Type pluginClass) {
00151             Plugin plugin = null;
00152             try {
00153                 // Call Default Plugin Constructor
00154                 plugin = (Plugin) Activator.CreateInstance(pluginClass);
00155             } catch (Exception e) {
00156                 // Plugin Initialization Error Occurred, Raise Event
00157                 string msg = "Plugin's Initialization Error: " + e.Message;
00158                 if (LoadFailed != null) LoadFailed(pluginClass, msg);
00159                 return;
00160             }
00161 
00162             // Add The Plugin To The Plugins Table
00163             pluginsTable.Add(plugin.Info, plugin);
00164         }
00165 
00167         private static Plugin[] SortPluginsByPriority() {
00168             // Initialize Plugins Priority Sorted Array
00169             Plugin[] plugins = new Plugin[pluginsTable.Count];
00170 
00171             ArrayList keys = new ArrayList(pluginsTable.Keys);
00172             keys.Sort();
00173 
00174             // Fill Plugins Array
00175             int i = 0;
00176             foreach (PluginInfo pluginInfo in keys) {
00177                 plugins[i++] = pluginsTable[pluginInfo] as Plugin;
00178             }
00179 
00180             keys = null;
00181             return(plugins);
00182         }
00183 
00185         private static Plugin[] ReverseSortPluginsByPriority() {
00186             // Initialize Plugins Priority Sorted Array
00187             Plugin[] plugins = new Plugin[pluginsTable.Count];
00188 
00189             ArrayList keys = new ArrayList(pluginsTable.Keys);
00190             keys.Sort();
00191 
00192             // Fill Plugins Array
00193             int i = pluginsTable.Count - 1;
00194             foreach (PluginInfo pluginInfo in keys) {
00195                 plugins[i--] = pluginsTable[pluginInfo] as Plugin;
00196             }
00197 
00198             keys = null;
00199             return(plugins);
00200         }
00201 
00202         // ============================================
00203         // PUBLIC Properties
00204         // ============================================
00207         public static Hashtable PluginsTable {
00208             get { return(pluginsTable); }
00209         }
00210     }
00211 }
